title: Hanes Men's Originals Lightweight Tri-Blend Crewneck T-Shirts
description: BASICS THAT ARE FAR FROM BASIC - A Stylish collection of cool, modern essentials designed for comfort, made for every body. Be yourself in Hanes Originals.
SOFT & COMFY FEEL - Our best cotton, polyester and rayon come together to make this soft and comfy t-shirt for men.
ADDED COMFORT - Shoulder to shoulder taping for comfort.
HANES QUALITY - Expertly constructed with double-needle stitched armholes.
FITS JUST RIGHT - This men's tee has a standard fit for a classic look.
MADE WITH RECYCLED MATERIALS - A portion of this shirt was made with recycled polyester.

Tried and true, this classic men's t-shirt showcases the best of Hanes® quality! A ribbed crewneck collar and robust double needle-stitched armholes make it the perfect go-to tee. Crafted from a knit poly/cotton/ rayon blend that features recycled polyester fibers, this classic tee delivers lightweight softness for a buttery feel you're going to love Delivering total comfort, Hanes men's short-sleeve tee is sure to become your new favorite style. Gym, track, or rest day—Hanes Originals has your back. Layer it under your favorite hoodie or wear it alone for easy styling.
